QuestData.Title: Blinding the Brokers
QuestData.Description:
We cannot allow Kel'Thuzad to discover who stopped his shipment.
None must be left to tell the tale of what transpired here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa broker witnesses in the Scaplian Ridge.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Balmedar in the House of Rituals.
QuestData.RewardText:
The guards have been dealt with? Good.
We have more pressing matters, now.
